Package models

Class Store

java.lang.Object
models.Store
public class Store
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Store()
    this is an generic constructor for store
    Store​(java.lang.String name, Trader tempProcess)
    this constructor sets the store name and establishes a link between store and trader by passing trader as a parameter.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addItem​(Item item, int index)
    this method adds items to the stores' invetory, it the item is already in the invetory it updates it's quantity
    void addProducts​(Item item)
    this method add the products to the store based on the category
    void addToStoreRegister​(double coins)
    this method adds coins to the stores' bank / cash register
    Item findProduct​(Item product)
    this method gets type Item as a parameter and search for that item in the store and returns it when it finds the item else returns null for item not found.
    java.lang.String[] getAllCategories()
    this method returns a list containing all the possible category types
    double getCashRegister()
    this method returns the current amount of coins store has
    java.lang.String getName()
    this method returns the name of the stroe
    java.util.ArrayList<Item> getProducts()
    this method returns an Array of type Items containing all the products a store has.
    java.util.ArrayList<Item> getProducts​(java.lang.String category)
    this method returns an Array of type Items containing all the products of a specific category type
    java.lang.String makePurchase​(Item tempProduct, double coins, int orderedQuantity)
    this method processes a purchase of an item for trader, so store is selling the item.
    void makeSale​(Item tempProduct, int sellQuantity)
    this method process the sale on an item of trader, so store is purchasing this item.
    void setName​(java.lang.String tempName)
    this method sets the name of the store
    void subtractStoreRegister​(double coins)
    this method subtracts coins from the stores' bank / cash register
    java.lang.String toString()
    String representation of the store and all of it's products line by line

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • makePurchase

      public java.lang.String makePurchase​(Item tempProduct, double coins, int orderedQuantity)
      this method processes a purchase of an item for trader, so store is selling the item. it requires the item trader wants to purchase and the quantity he/she wants to purchase. This method doesn't return anything but invokes one of the methods in the interface based on the outcome on the transaction. if the transaction fails it invokes purrchaseUnsuccessfull from interface otherwise it invokes purchaseSuccessfull from interface.
      Parameters:
      tempProduct -
      coins -
      orderedQuantity -

    • makeSale

      public void makeSale​(Item tempProduct, int sellQuantity)
      this method process the sale on an item of trader, so store is purchasing this item. it requires the item trader wants to sell and the quantity he/she wants to sell. This method doesn't return anything but invokes one of the methods in the interface based on the outcome on the transaction. if the transaction fails it invokes unsuccessfullSale from interface otherwise it invokes successfullSale from interface.
      Parameters:
      tempProduct -
      sellQuantity -
